message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. I know it's worth a lot to you, and this price reflects that. Let me know if you're interested!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500. I hope this revised offer works for you.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get closer to my initial price. Would you be willing to go up to $9,750? This would be a fair compromise for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I can offer $9,600 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
